title: Update Business Hours
description: Ensure your business hours are accurate, including special hours for holidays and seasonal changes.

title: Complete Business Description
description: Write a compelling 750-character description highlighting your services, specialties, and what makes you unique.

title: Add Business Attributes
description: Add relevant attributes like wheelchair accessible, outdoor seating, free Wi-Fi, pet-friendly, etc.

title: Verify Contact Information
description: Confirm phone number, email, and ensure all contact methods are working and monitored.

title: Update Website URL
description: Ensure website link is working, mobile-friendly, and points to relevant landing page.

title: Add Services Menu
description: List your services or products with descriptions and pricing where applicable.

title: Set Up Appointment Booking
description: Enable online booking or appointment scheduling if applicable to your business.

title: Respond to Recent Reviews
description: Reply to all reviews from the past 7 days. Show customers you value their feedback.

title: Thank 5-Star Reviewers
description: Send personalized thank you responses to customers who left excellent reviews.

title: Address Negative Reviews
description: Professionally respond to 1-3 star reviews, offer solutions, and show you care.

title: Request Reviews from Customers
description: Send review request links to 10 satisfied customers via email or SMS.

title: Create Review Generation Campaign
description: Set up QR codes or review cards to encourage in-person customers to leave reviews.

title: Upload 10 New Photos
description: Add fresh, high-quality photos of your business, products, or services.

title: Add Team Photos
description: Upload professional photos of team members to humanize your brand.

title: Showcase Product Photos
description: Upload high-quality product images with good lighting and multiple angles.

title: Update Cover Photo
description: Change cover photo to reflect current season, promotions, or branding.

title: Add Interior Photos
description: Show the inside of your business - ambiance, decor, seating areas.

title: Add Exterior Photos
description: Upload clear photos of your storefront, signage, and parking area.

title: Create Weekly Update Post
description: Share what's new this week - new products, services, or announcements.

title: Promote Special Offer
description: Create an offer post with discount code, promotion details, and CTA button.

title: Announce Upcoming Event
description: Post about events, workshops, or special happenings at your business.

title: Feature Product of the Week
description: Highlight a specific product or service with details, photos, and benefits.

title: Share Customer Testimonial
description: Create a post featuring positive customer feedback or success story.

title: Post Behind-the-Scenes Content
description: Share how products are made or show your team at work.

title: Share Health & Safety Updates
description: Post about safety measures, cleanliness protocols, or operational changes.

title: Review Monthly Performance
description: Analyze views, searches, and customer actions from the past 30 days.

title: Analyze Search Queries
description: Review what keywords customers use to discover your business.

title: Compare Competitor Performance
description: Benchmark your metrics against similar businesses in your area.

title: Track Customer Actions
description: Monitor phone calls, direction requests, website clicks, and booking actions.

title: Review Photo Performance
description: See which photos get the most views and engagement.

title: Export Monthly Report
description: Download and save performance data for record-keeping and analysis.

title: Update Holiday Hours
description: Set special hours for upcoming holidays and notify customers.

title: Refresh Business Description
description: Update your description to highlight new services, achievements, or seasonal offerings.

title: Add Seasonal Services
description: Update your services menu with seasonal offerings and promotions.

title: Create Video Tour
description: Upload a short video showcasing your business, team, or products.

title: Highlight Customer Reviews
description: Create posts featuring your best customer reviews and testimonials.

title: Announce New Arrivals
description: Post about new products, services, or team members.

title: Share Community Involvement
description: Post about your community engagement, charity work, or local partnerships.

title: Optimize for Voice Search
description: Update your business info with natural language phrases for voice search.

title: Monitor Review Trends
description: Analyze review sentiment and identify common feedback themes.

title: Add FAQ Section
description: Create answers to commonly asked questions about your business, pricing, and services.

title: Add Payment Methods
description: List all accepted payment options including digital wallets and contactless payments.

title: Update Service Areas
description: Define and update the geographic areas where you provide services or delivery.

title: Add Business Opening Date
description: Display when your business was established to build trust and credibility.

title: Enable Messaging
description: Turn on messaging feature to allow customers to contact you directly through GMB.

title: Add Accessibility Features
description: Specify accessibility options like wheelchair entrance, parking, restrooms, and seating.

title: Update Business Categories
description: Review and optimize primary and secondary business categories for better discoverability.

title: Add Health and Safety Attributes
description: Update safety measures like mask requirements, temperature checks, and sanitization protocols.

title: Set Up Service Area Radius
description: Define delivery or service radius if you operate without a physical storefront.

title: Add Amenities and Highlights
description: Showcase unique features like women-led, veteran-owned, LGBTQ+ friendly, or family-friendly.

title: Add Business Logo
description: Upload a high-quality, professional logo that represents your brand identity.

title: Verify Business Location
description: Complete or re-verify your business address through Google's verification process.

title: Add Parking Information
description: Specify parking options like free parking, paid parking, street parking, or parking lot.

title: Set Up Multiple Locations
description: Add and configure additional business locations if you have multiple branches.

title: Add Language Support
description: Indicate which languages your staff speaks to attract diverse customers.

title: Update Dining Options
description: For restaurants, specify dine-in, takeout, delivery, curbside pickup options.

title: Add Crowd Information
description: Set expectations about typical wait times and busy periods.

title: Configure Appointment Settings
description: Set up appointment types, duration, and availability preferences.

title: Add Pet-Friendly Status
description: Indicate whether your business welcomes pets and any related policies.

title: Update Wi-Fi Information
description: Specify if you offer free Wi-Fi and whether password is required.

title: Add Price Range
description: Set your business price level from budget-friendly to upscale.

title: Set Up Google Reserve
description: Enable direct booking through Google for appointments or reservations.

title: Add Outdoor Seating Info
description: Specify if you have outdoor seating, patio, or terrace options.

title: Configure Business Type
description: Ensure your business type is correctly set (retail, service, restaurant, etc.).

title: Add Reservation Links
description: Include direct links to your reservation or booking system.

title: Update Seasonal Attributes
description: Add or remove seasonal features like heated outdoor seating or air conditioning.

title: Add Planning Attributes
description: Specify if reservations required, accepts walk-ins, or appointment-only.

title: Update Kids-Friendly Features
description: Indicate if you're good for kids and have high chairs, kids menu, or changing tables.

title: Add Dietary Options
description: For food businesses, specify vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or halal options.

title: Set Up Products Catalog
description: Add individual products with descriptions, images, and prices to your GMB catalog.

title: Add Business Identification Number
description: Include tax ID or business registration number for verification and trust.

title: Configure Order Online Links
description: Add direct links to your online ordering platform or e-commerce site.

title: Update Group Accommodations
description: Specify if you can accommodate large groups and maximum party size.

title: Add Alcohol Options
description: For restaurants/bars, specify beer, wine, cocktails, or full bar availability.

title: Set Atmosphere Attributes
description: Describe your ambiance as casual, upscale, romantic, trendy, or family-friendly.

title: Add Service Options Details
description: Specify in-store shopping, in-store pickup, same-day delivery options.

title: Configure Amenity Details
description: Add specific amenities like restrooms, gender-neutral facilities, or nursing rooms.

title: Update Cuisine Types
description: For restaurants, add all relevant cuisine categories and specialties.

title: Add Brand Associations
description: Link your business to parent companies or franchise brands if applicable.

title: Set Up Menu Link
description: Add direct link to your full menu or service list on your website.

title: Add Recycling Program Info
description: Highlight sustainability efforts like recycling, composting, or eco-friendly practices.

title: Configure Smoking Policy
description: Specify if smoking is allowed, prohibited, or if there's a designated area.

title: Add Entertainment Options
description: List entertainment features like live music, sports on TV, karaoke, or games.

title: Update Dress Code
description: Specify if casual, business casual, or formal attire is expected.

title: Add Loyalty Program Details
description: Promote your rewards or loyalty program with enrollment information.

title: Configure Gift Card Options
description: Add information about purchasing gift cards online or in-store.

title: Add Professional Credentials
description: List licenses, certifications, or professional memberships relevant to your business.

title: Update Noise Level
description: Indicate whether your venue is quiet, moderate, or lively/loud.

title: Add Event Hosting Info
description: Specify if you host private events, parties, or corporate functions.

title: Configure Age Restrictions
description: Indicate if your business is 18+, 21+, or all ages welcome.

title: Add Membership Requirements
description: Specify if membership is required or available for exclusive benefits.

title: Update Equipment Available
description: For gyms/studios, list available equipment, machines, or facilities.

title: Add Consultation Options
description: Indicate if you offer free consultations, estimates, or initial assessments.

title: Configure Waiting Area Info
description: Describe waiting area amenities like seating, refreshments, or entertainment.

title: Add Warranty Information
description: Highlight warranties, guarantees, or satisfaction policies you offer.

title: Update Service Specializations
description: Detail specific niches, specialties, or areas of expertise within your field.

title: Add Emergency Services Info
description: Indicate if you offer 24/7 emergency services or after-hours support.

title: Configure Customer Demographics
description: Optimize profile for your target audience (seniors, students, professionals, families).

title: Add Partnership Badges
description: Display partnerships with recognized brands, suppliers, or organizations.

title: Update Technology Features
description: Highlight tech offerings like mobile app, contactless payment, or virtual services.
